papers.title: Large Language Models in Social Media Research: Opportunities and Challenges
papers.abstract: This paper examines the application of large language models in social media research, highlighting both opportunities for enhanced analysis and challenges in validation.

papers.title: Coordinated Inauthentic Behavior Detection: A Systematic Review
papers.abstract: A comprehensive review of methods and approaches for detecting coordinated inauthentic behavior across social media platforms.

papers.title: The Future of Digital Ethnography in Platform Studies
papers.abstract: Exploring methodological innovations in digital ethnography for studying social media platforms and online communities.
